about_the_game:
Overview

This is a puzzle game where you create couples. Place panels with various effects on a 3x3 grid and help two people in love meet. You can freely choose the combination of couples, such as male-female, male-male, or female-female.

Strong Puzzle Elements

We have prepared a total of 76 levels, ranging from easy to difficult. Each level has a specific number of characters, their arrangement, and the number and types of panels. The level is cleared when all the characters on the field are paired up.

Each level has been designed with a focus on making the puzzle-solving experience enjoyable. Instead of simply increasing the number of similar levels to inflate the game's volume, we have adjusted the levels to ensure that each one offers a unique and engaging challenge.

While the time it takes to clear all the levels may vary depending on the player, it is estimated that it will take around 10 hours to complete all levels.

Support for Various Genders

By default, the game pairs boys and girls together, but you can change this setting from the options menu to allow for same-gender pairings, such as boys with boys or girls with girls. Additionally, there are more detailed settings available for further customization.

Story

The protagonist is a woman in pajamas, as seen in the main visual. Her profession is a romance novel writer.

When brainstorming ideas for her stories, she never skips a mental simulation. In her mind, she creates couples, has them converse, go on dates, and be affectionate with each other, using these imagined scenarios to expand her story ideas.

This game, a puzzle about creating couples, is a representation of her daydreams (or rather, her job to earn a living).

Let's try playing on a smartphone or tablet

With the Remote Play feature, you can play this game on your smartphone or tablet. Instead of using arrow keys or ABXY buttons, you can control the game with just taps and drags. Every once in a while, why not take a break from your computer and relax in bed, playing on your smartphone?

Streaming Policy

Play videos and screenshots of 'Couple Maker' can be used on SNS, blogs, and video posting sites as long as they do not violate public order and morals or laws. Feel free to monetize it. Please keep promoting it!
